Monday to Friday: 9am to 6pm
Saturday: 9am to 1pm
confirmDeleteTask: Are you sure you want to delete this task?

faq1Question: How to add a new pet?
faq1Answer: Go to the Profile tab, scroll to "My Pets" and tap the (+) button in the upper right corner.
faq2Answer: In the Routine tab, tap the (+) button in the upper right corner, select the pet, fill in the data and save.
faq3Question: Can I have more than one pet?
faq3Answer: Yes! You can add as many pets as you want and create individual tasks for each one.
faq4Question: How do I record my pet's mood?
faq4Answer: Go to the Mood tab, select your pet and choose the emoji that best represents how they are feeling today.
faq5Question: Where do I see my tasks?
faq5Answer: Tasks appear in the Routine tab. You can see them by date in the calendar or all pending ones in the list below.
termsContent1: By using Pet Planner, you agree to these terms of service. If you do not agree, you should not use the application.
termsContent2: Pet Planner is a pet care management application. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account and for all activities that occur under your account.
termsContent3: You retain all rights to the information and photos you add to the app. We do not share your data with third parties without your explicit permission.
termsContent4: The application does not replace professional veterinary care. Always consult a veterinarian for your pet's health issues.
termsContent5: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. We will notify you of significant changes.
privacyContent1:
We only collect information necessary to provide our services:
‚Ä¢ Tutor name and email
‚Ä¢ Pet information (name, breed, age, photos)
‚Ä¢ Task data and mood records
privacyContent2:
Your information is used exclusively to:
‚Ä¢ Provide app functionality
‚Ä¢ Send task notifications
‚Ä¢ Improve user experience
privacyContent3: All data is stored securely on your device. If you enable backup, data is encrypted before being sent to the cloud.
privacyContent4: We do not sell, rent or share your personal information with third parties for marketing purposes. Anonymous data may be used for analytics.
privacyContent5:
You have the right to:
‚Ä¢ Access your data
‚Ä¢ Correct incorrect information
‚Ä¢ Request data deletion
‚Ä¢ Export your data
privacyContent6: We use local storage technologies only to keep you logged in and remember your preferences.
privacyContent7: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure or destruction.
alertNegativeMood: Your pet has been showing negative moods frequently. Consider consulting a veterinarian.
attentionDifficultDays: Your pet has been having difficult days. Pay attention to their behavior.
veryHappyPet: Your pet is very happy! Keep it up!
startTrackingMood: Start tracking your pet's mood to monitor their well-being!
clearDataWarning: This action will remove all app data, including pets, tasks and settings. This action cannot be undone.
dataImported: Data imported successfully! The app will be reloaded.
couldNotImportData: Could not import data. Please verify the file is valid.
recommendation1: Your pet is doing great! Keep up the current care routine.
recommendation2: Your pet is doing well, but watch for behavioral changes.
recommendation3: Monitor your pet more closely and consider adjusting the routine.
recommendation4: Consult a veterinarian to assess your pet's health.
notesPlaceholder: Add observations about your pet's day... (behavior, activities, special situations, etc.)
